description:
Bake, steam, roast or stew on a stove or over an open fire and elevate your cooking at home or at the campsite. This cast iron dutch oven is lighter than traditional cast iron pans, without losing cooking performance.

  • Cast-iron performance with a corrosion-resistant finish
  • Lightweight cast-iron is 30-40% lighter than traditional cast ironware
  • Handle for easy lifting or hanging
  • Polished bottom works on all stove surfaces, in the oven or on a campfire grill
  • Stand included for stability over coals
name: GSI Guidecast Dutch Oven Set
